name: AVForums Xenforo 2 Wider Forums
description:
The AVForums Xenforo launch has limited the site to be 1200px wide. This Style will override that width to make it almost the whole width of your browser window.

The screenshot was taken on a monitor with the native resolution 1920x1080.

Note: I believe this will currently only work on the forums part of the site.
